name: 14_context_switching_burn_tax_mitigation
messages_sequence: Calendar: 22 meetings/week; avg 6 distinct projects/day; frequent 15-minute gaps.
Slack: High DM load; frequent interrupts from two stakeholder accounts.
Journal: Feels 'busy but not productive'; tasks spilling into nights.
Role/preferences: Engineering manager of 12; values maker time; ADHD tendencies.
